name: Farmer Simulator v1.0.1
description:
FARMER SIMULATOR BY: PretzelPie

Play a simple clicker game and buy upgrades to get more money. (Remember that 1 mil is the.... never mind) Have fun!

v0.7 :God fruit is here

v0.7.3 :Balance adjustments with money and food

v0.7.4 :Balance adjustments to the god fruit

v0.7.5 :Fixed a issue that made the god fruit invisible even when already bought

v1.0.0 :The game's 1.0 version is out! Now buy fruit and it will multiply by the cost of said fruit.

(For remixing and/or testing before itch.io release) Original scratch game link here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/394280597/  

( I am MinecraftPro000077)
